channel.title: McNary Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in McNary Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-82 East Exit 1 Offramp at US-395/US-730
item.description: I-82 East Exit 1 Offramp at US-395/US-730 in Umatilla. Turn left for US-730 East/US-395 South/McNary Dam/Hermiston.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 179
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 179 - I-82 West/Hermiston/Umatilla. I-84/US-30 continues east towards Pendleton and Ontario.

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 179
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 179 (I-82 West). Use I-82 west for Kennewick (WA) and Spokane (WA).

item.title: I-84 East Approaching Exit 179
item.description: I-84 east approaching Exit 179 - I-82 West/Hermiston/Umatilla.

item.title: End I-82 East at I-84
item.description: End I-82 east at I-84. Use I-84 west to Portland; I-84 east to Pendleton.

item.title: I-82 East Approaching I-84
item.description: I-82 east approaching I-84. Use I-84 west to The Dalles and Hood River; use I-84 east to LaGrande and Ontario.

item.title: I-82 East Approaching I-84
item.description: I-82 east approaching I-84. Use right lane for I-84 west to Portland.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 10 Approaching I-84
item.description: I-82 east at Exit 10 - Westland Road. Approaching I-84 to Portland and Pendleton.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 5
item.description: I-82 east at Exit 5 - Power Line Road.

item.title: I-82 East - Exit 1
item.description: I-82 east at Exit 1 - US-395/US-730/Umatilla/Hermiston. Continue east on I-82 for I-84/Portland/Pendleton.

item.title: I-82 West - Exit 131 (Washington)
item.description: I-82 west at Columbia River bridge. Approaching Exit 131 - WA-14/Vancouver/Plymouth.

item.title: US-730 East at I-82 West/US-395 Jct.
item.description: US-730 east at I-82 West/US-395 Jct. Turn left for I-82 West/US-395 North to Kennewick (WA) and Spokane (WA).

item.title: I-82 West - Exit 1 Offramp at US-395/US-730
item.description: I-82 west Exit 1 offramp at US-395/US-730. Turn left for US-730 west to Umatilla City Center and Irrigon. Turn right for US-730 East/US-395 South to McNary Dam and Port of Umatilla.

item.title: I-82 West - Exit 1
item.description: I-82 west approaching Exit 1 - US-730/US-395 South/Umatilla/Irrigon.

item.title: I-82 West - Exit 5
item.description: I-82 west approaching Exit 5 - Power Line Road.

item.title: I-82 West - Leaving Umatilla Army Depot
item.description: I-82 West - Leaving Umatilla Army Depot in Umatilla County.

item.title: I-82 West - Umatilla County
item.description: I-82 west shield in Umatilla County.

item.title: I-82 West - Overhead and Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-82 west. Distance to Umatilla, Kennewick (WA) and Yakima (WA).

item.title: I-82 West - Exit 10
item.description: I-82 west at Exit 10 - Westland Road.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 179
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 179 - I-82 West/Kennewick/Umatilla. Continue west on I-84/US-30 to The Dalles and Portland.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 179
item.description: I-84 West at Exit 179 - I-82 West/Kennewick/Umatilla.

item.title: I-84 West - Approaching Exit 179
item.description: I-84 West approaching Exit 179. Use I-82 West (Exit 179) for Yakima and Spokane (both in Washington).

item.title: I-84 West Exits 180/179 - I-82 Jct.
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 180 - Westland Road. Approaching Exit 179 - I-82 West/Umatilla/Kennewick.

item.title: End I-82 East at I-84
item.description: End I-82 east at I-84 west to Portland; east to Pendleton.

item.title: I-82 East Approaching I-84
item.description: Approaching eastern end of I-82 at I-84. Use right lane for I-84 west to Portland.

item.title: I-82 East Exit 1
item.description: I-82 east at Exit 1, US-395/US-730/Hermiston/Umatilla.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 179
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 179, I-82 West/Umatilla/Kennewick, 2 miles.

item.title: I-84 West Exits 180/179 - I-82 Jct.
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 180, Westland Road. I-84 west approaching Exit 179, I-82 West/Umatilla/Kennewick, 3/4 mile.
